item.title: First AI-Orchestrated Cyber Espionage Campaign Disclosed - Offbeat AI Watch
item.description: Anthropic reveals the first documented large-scale AI cyberattack with 80-90% automation across 30 global organizations. Plus Microsoft Fara-7B on-device agents, Google HOPE continual learning, Scribe hits unicorn status, and 5 trends reshaping enterprise AI security and deployment.
item.author: Shashwat Ghosh
